name: 科技與工程師資教育專題研究
description: This course focused on exploring the theory and practices, trends and issues of teacher education in technology and engineering education for the purpose of developing technology and engineering teacher educators’ professional competency. The following teaching methods and learning activities will be employed in this course: lecture, discussion, presentation et al.
goals: To explore the trends and issues of technology and engineering preservice teacher education, educational internship, teacher certification and professional development.
Learn to conduct a small study of technology and engineering teacher education.

methodologies.note: To explain the important concepts of each topic.
Students must read the data, then have to publish their comment and discuss with teacher and classmates.
Students must conduct small studies and try to solve problems.
Students conduct a small research project through the team-based cooperative learning approach.
To use network multimedia resources to improve students' learning outcome.
To improve students' understanding of the actual situation through knowledge sharing and case discussions.

grading.note: Students must read the data, then try to guild and discuss with teacher and classmates.
To discuss the topics of each week.
To assess students’ attendance and attitudes toward learning.

(1) Journal paper (25%) Each student must write an article about technology and engineering teacher education. Then have to publish in international journals or seminars with censorship system before mid-term exam week.
(2) Research Project (25%) Each student writes a research project of the Ministry of Science and Technology about technology and engineering teacher education. The project must be published during final exam week.
